item.title: Need help inserting my custom items! always get errors
item.dc:creator: @Umah Umah
item.description:
@Umah wrote:

[quote=“lukenuke75, post:3, topic:290308”]i do that. this always happens. i added everything in the right place do i need a drop model?
or what. i added my models in models and i also put the code in the right place. people say its the ints idk about that but im connfused i have been trying to make my custom item for like 2 weeks now and this is the problem i get all the time …[/quote]

You typed while logged in: “add model 12222”? That should be the main reason. Maybe it’s the wrong model, doubt it though.

item.title: Need help inserting my custom items! always get errors

item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

When i create custom items i always get an error like this one

i got the item to weild on the body now but i cant make my d platebody actually show. can anyone help me here are my ints…

if(i == 12222) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 12222; //Model invent/drop id class8.anInt181 = 1000; //Model zoom (decrease to zoom in) class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 12222; //Model wield id (male) class8.anInt200 = 12222; //Model wield id (female) class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon PlateBody"; class8.aByteArray178 = "An Ancient PlateBody".getBytes(); }
